revised_title: Meteorological Observations and Climate Data from Petersburgh and Lunden in 1724-1725
tldr: This article presents meteorological observations and climate data from Petersburgh and Lunden in 1724-1725, including daily records of barometer, wind, weather, and thermometer readings. The author, Wm. Derham, provides an abstract of the observations made by Tho. Consett, highlighting the range of barometric pressure, temperature, and weather patterns throughout the year.
